entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Lambton Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle or freezing drizzle. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle changing to periods of drizzle late in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending early in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
